commentary: In terms of iterating all the preexisting patterns after this plot reboot, sylladex shenanigans are definitely one of the sillier rodeos we've already been to, ad nauseam, so the only remotely defensible thing to do with it now is to mercilessly mock the entire idea of a sylladex by running with outlandishly unusable versions right off the bat. Consequential slapstick is immediate.
